item.title: How I Setup My Dotfiles
item.author: Michael Espeña
item.description: Warning This is still just a test blog (really the README of my dotfiles repo) published for my restarting of this website. Local dotfiles These dotfiles are tracked using a git bare repository and need these scripts to work properly. Set up for git bare repo These are the steps for setting up this git bare repository in case I forget (which I probably will). Step 1: Initialize repository Create and initialize the git bare repository with the following commands.
